resume_text: Data Scientist with 7 years of experience. Python, SQL, Pandas, NumPy. Built models with scikit-learn and TensorFlow on AWS. Dockerized microservices and deployed with Kubernetes. AWS Certified Solutions Architect.
Business Analyst experienced with Excel (advanced), Power BI dashboards, and SQL for analytics. Led Agile projects and managed stakeholders; Scrum and Kanban expertise.
Marketing Manager specializing in SEO/SEM, campaign strategy, and content marketing. Built dashboards in Tableau and collaborated with product teams.
Finance Analyst with CPA, financial modeling, budgeting, and Snowflake DW experience. Strong Excel and SQL for data analysis.
Operations Lead (Lean Six Sigma Black Belt). Managed logistics, process improvement, and used AWS + Spark for ETL pipelines. Agile project management across cross-functional teams.
